welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ardrossan, a charming coastal town known for its picturesque views and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Prestwick Airport houses all check-in counters, security checkpoints, and departure gates.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Prestwick Airport is used for the handling and storage of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glasgow International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Glasgow International Airport is used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the instructions to access the internet.
